content: <!DOCTYPE html> Bar's Website Hi, I'm Bar üëãüèª About Me Professional Currently pursuing an MSc in Bioinformatics at Tel Aviv University My advisor is Prof. Adi Stern. My research interests include evolutionary biology and population genetics of viruses, particularly SARS-CoV-2. Former Production Engineer at Meta, specializing in system reliability and scalability. BSc in Computer Science from the Technion. Personal I live in Ramat Gan (Israel) with my husband and our dog. When it comes to hobbies, I'm a true 'Jack of all trades, master of none.' I enjoy experimenting with gardening, sewing, cross-stitch, cooking, baking, and photography. This Website A blog/portfolio/CV of sorts.
